LanguageData.DMS_Scenario.description: One warrant officer and a few automatroids of the colonial fleet attempt to rebuild anew.
LanguageData.DMS_Scenario.scenario.description: As the vanguard of the colonial fleet, your final orders you received were to wait in cryosleep for the arrival of the main fleet. Recently, a strange yet familiar announcement broadcast ended the long and anxious wait...\n\n"Code five: The fleet has entered synchronized orbit. Express our greatest gratitude to all the vanguard pioneers protecting the Lighthouse."
LanguageData.DMS_Scenario.scenario.name: Last Command
LanguageData.DMS_Scenario.scenario.parts.GameStartDia:
When you wake up from your cryosleep, you find that this cruel world has left behind nothing more than the remnants of the Lighthouse.

Time and scavengers have almost stripped away all traces of your and your companions' past existence...

Just as it was so long ago, you have arrived here with nothing. You must rebuild the remnants of the Lighthouse anew.

Only this time, those you toiled and fought with through it all are now distant memories of the forgotten past.
LanguageData.DMS_Scenario.scenario.summary: One warrant officer and a few automatroids of the colonial fleet attempt to rebuild anew.
